column4: so umm, i want to install dapper without a livecd, do i use the server or alternatice cd ?
i'd rather not play with it before final release
i want to install dapper using the methods i used to install breezy, you know, that blue and grey screen
aack, there are three online, a) desktop cd, b) server c) alternative........
if you use LiveCD you'll must use espresso
for what do you need dapper? desktop or server? choose
i assume you know that default installation is the one using espresso
i think ? i mean i ususally don't remember SN's that well, do i know you ? i DO think you've helped me b4 though
yes, i helped you a lot some day :D
i remember there was a lot of discussion last few days with you
, tutorials don't help as much as IRC and people
that's why i became very attracted to #ubuntu
